業者名稱: 臺灣碩騰股份有限公司
地址: STATION WORKS, CAMLOUGH ROAD, NEWRY, Co. DOWN, BT35 6JP NORTHERN IRELAND
效能(適應症): 馬、牛、羊、豬：預防及治療維他命缺乏症。
ingredients: VITAMIN A PALMITATE 15,000IU; CHOLECALCIFEROL (VITAMIN D3) 25MCG;ALPHA-TOCOPHEROL ACETATE(VITAMIN E) 20MG; THIAMINE HCL(VITAMIN B1)10MG; RIBOFLAVINE SODIUM PHOSPHATE(VITAMIN B2)5MG; PYRIDOXINE HCL(VITAMIN B6) 3MG; NICOTINAMIDE 35MG; DEXPANTHENOL 25MG;CYANOCOBALAMIN (VITAMIN B12) 25MCG; CHLOROCRESOL (AS PRESERVATIVE)1MG.
